name: vscode-banditcpp-test-adapter
description: Run your Bandit tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Matthias FÃ¼g <matthias.fueg@dampsoft.de>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

banditTestExplorer.testsuites.description: The configuration of your bandit test projects. Either a single configuration object or a path to the JSON configuration file (relative to the workspace folder or absolute path).

banditTestExplorer.parallelProcessLimit.description: The limit of parallel processes startet during a test run.

banditTestExplorer.watchTimeoutSec.description: A timeout in seconds that helps to prevent the auto run when watched files are compiled often.

banditTestExplorer.allowKillProcess.description: Allows to hard kill running processes when a test run is cancelled or aborted.

banditTestExplorer.logpanel.description: Enables the output of diagnostic logs to the integrated output panel.

banditTestExplorer.logfile.description: Enables the output of diagnostic logs to the specified file if provided.

banditTestExplorer.loglevel.description: The logging level used to filter notifications. All notifications of the same or higher level will be logged.
